column1: Uchi////Scallop nigiri is awesome! The seaweed wrap tastes crispy and fresh
column2: mixed with their awesome vinegared rice(I just created a new word)
column3: it triggers your childhood memory which deeply rooted in your brain and heart! Yea im over exaggerated...but anyways
column4: that taste I would never forget about..details details Japanese food is all about the details
